abstract: Pallinghurst Resources Australia has increased its offer for Consolidated Minerals in an effort to thwart a rival bid from Territory Resources. Pallinghurst, an investment fund led by former BHP Billiton C.E.O. Brian Gilbertson, has now offered A$752 million ($662 million) in cash. Territory’s bid is higher at A$806 million, but includes stock, reported Bloomberg News.
